definition: scale drawing of a structure, make plans for something
details:
noun
- scale drawing of a structure
= example: scale drawing of a structure
= synonyms: architectural plan
- an arrangement scheme
= synonyms: design
- a series of steps to be carried out or goals to be accomplished
= example: a series of steps to be carried out or goals to be accomplished
= synonyms: program
verb
- make plans for something
= example: make plans for something
- have the will and intention to carry out some action
= example: have the will and intention to carry out some action
= synonyms: be after
- make or work out a plan for
= synonyms: project
- make a design of
= example: make a design of
= synonyms: design
